response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds significant importance to both of us. Considering its true worth, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This represents a remarkable opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I trust this offer aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 14500}
